entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Random.NextTimeSpan #78488
  • Changed behaviour for PropertyInfo comparison between .net6 and .net7 #78487
  • .NET 7 extremely high memory usage #78481
  • Blazor C# Debugger doesn't hit C# breakpoint after calling async Javascript function #78475
  • Improve logging of JitStressRegs flags in JitDump #78474
  • [API Proposal]: Convert.TryFromHexString #78472
  • ConsoleManualTests.ReadKey_KeyChords failures #78467
  • Receive Error while trying to use: System.Management throw System.PlatformNotSupportedException: 'System.Management currently is only supported for Windows desktop applications.' #78464
    Future
  • Local test run fails to analyze HardwareIntrinsics test results #78462
  • Type load for GDV guesses in R2R code has observable behavior #78461
    Future
  • [mono][debugger] MAUI Android crashing the app and the debugger #78460
  • System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection has wrong argument check for anonymous authentication #78459
  • [API Proposal]: Extend System.Net.Mime.MediaTypeNames #78458
  • Unify BufferedFileStreamStrategy seeking #78457
    8.0.0
  • TarReader doesn't read paths with spaces from Pax extended attributes #78456
  • SyndicationFeed_Write_RSS_Atom test failing with "IOException : The file '/tmp/' already exists." #78454
  • Can't validate CMS signature in .NET 6/7, works in .NET 4.8 #78453
  • Improve the JavaScript interop code generators to support additional scenarios #78455
    Future
  • Performance Benchmark #78451
  • AppDomain.CurrentDomain.GetAssemblies() and AssemblyLoadContexts being unloaded #78449
  • Debug.Assert when using ReceiveFrom on UnixDomainSocket #78448
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json.JsonSerializer.Serialize, when JsonIgnoreAttribute and "required" used together, throw exception #78443
  • .NET 8 developers can verify more APIs for correct usage to speed up their development #78442
    8.0.0
  • `Guid(ReadOnlySpan<Byte>)` could be optimized #78440

Closed

  • .NET 7 DateTime.AddXXX undocumented behaviour changes #78452
    Future
  • Regressions in System.Collections.IterateForEach<String> #78407
  • Throw helper methods that just construct exceptions get inlined #78300
    8.0.0
  • dotnet test does not support arm64 for platform and does not pass args to the build of other projects #78325
  • Memory leak from linked cancellation token registrations #78180
  • Probable wrong codegen or stack corruption in .NET 7.0.0 #78387
  • Arithmetic overflow in code, generated by `GeneratedRegexAttribute` #78214
    7.0.x
  • [wasi] Add new RID for WASI #77780
    8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Review COOP helpers that may cause long GC suspension pauses. #73655
    8.0.0
  • SCrypt.ComputeDerivedKey crashes when using .NET 7 #78444
  • [MONO][Marshal] Remove unused marshal-noilgen code #78422
  • Support TLS 1.3 Early Data (0-RTT) with SslStream #49274
    Future
  • How to use the right certificate from a .NET Keystore for a .NET SSL application on linux #78369
  • Incorrect order of arguments when calling the `XmlConfigurationElementTextContent` constructor #78212
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] add support for retrying debugger tests when chrome launch times out #76528
  • Des decryption result error on .net6, It is normal in the .netfx4.5 / .net5 environment #78445
  • [tests] SyndicationFeed_Load_Write_RSS_Feed failing on Wasm with tmp/ file already exists #77526
  • [API Proposal]: Simple one-shot hashing methods that produce the relevant type #76279
    8.0.0
  • JsonPolymorphic Deserialization Fails When TypeDiscriminatorPropertyName Not First Property #78447
  • OutOfMemoryException in container that didn't have enough memory to allocate an LOH segment #77961
    8.0.0
  • Pass constants to parameters marked as [ConstantExpected] #33771
    8.0.0
  • switch expression has suboptimal codegen #78439
  • Store list of instantiated types in MIBC #78432
  • RegEx: Support for POSIX character classes #22401
    Future
  • Overload to Regex.Escape with RegexOptions.IgnorePatternWhitespace option #24322
    Future
  • RegEx, please add Pre-Defined Subroutines. #34269
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Code quality concerns #78485
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add support for standalone GC back compatibility #78484
    area-GC-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Jiterpreter cleanup #78482
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Remove unused arguments from C# test Mains #78478
    test-enhancement
  • linux-requirements.md: add missing line-continuation #78476
    area-Meta
  • [release/7.0] Fix relative symlink support in TarFile #78470
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO, 7.0.x
  • Console.Unix: don't calculate cached cursor position from the last column. #78466
    area-System.Console, community-contribution
  • Remove invalidation of whitespace in TryGetNextExtendedAttribute #78465
    area-System.IO
  • Use a list for tests in src/tests/run.py #78463
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Use helpers in Guid's ROS<byte> constructor #78446
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Remove some unnecessary templating in assembly binder #78441
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Remove some Windows specific formatters #78434
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0

Merged

  • Linker into runtime2 #78077
    NO-MERGE, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • Don't inline >8 bytes of IL calls in BBJ_THROW #78386
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add intrinsics for BitOperations zero count #78391
    area-System.Numerics, 8.0.0
  • Fixes around virtual method hierarchy validation #78157
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove most *PrintToStd* functions #78437
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Prefer OutputRid over PackageRID for output artifacts. #76871
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Only R2R public methods, methods that override public methods, and internal methods that aren't always inlined #75793
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Disable distributed transactions test #78468
    area-System.Transactions
  • Fix single quote processing from debug output #78479
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add readme for remaining M.E.Logging libraries #78477
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • [wasm] Add link to debugger docs from WasmAppHost docs #78471
    documentation, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Adding check on R2RDump #78343
    area-R2RDump-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Address some COOP native helpers that could cause suspension pauses. #78450
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • new RID: wasi-wasm #78376
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [marshal] Cleanup dead ifdefs #78435
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Adds readme for more extension items #77865
    area-Meta
  • Fix parameters order when creating XmlConfigurationElementTextContent object #78433
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Use Helix's retry mechanism to re-run debugger tests on CI if .. #78357
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, area-Debugger-mono
  • Use zero register in csel when possible #78330
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Use compile time handle for instruction comments on xarch too #78382
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Dedup Enumerable.Any with Enumerable.TryGetNonEnumeratedCount #78438
    area-System.Linq, 8.0.0
  • Add sdcardfs to filesystems list #78424
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Add HashTo/GetCurrentHashAs{UInt32/64} methods #78075
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Use IndexOfAny in IndexOfHtmlAttributeEncodingChars #78240
    area-System.Net
  • Fixing typo in area-owners #78429
    area-Meta

Updated

  • Use ASCII strings in source files #78265
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • add 0x63 status code #74780
    blocked, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic, community-contribution
  • Extending variable live ranges in more cases #77439
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Introduce OptLevel() in jit #77465
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Extend ProcessStartInfo to allow setting LOGON_NETCREDENTIALS_ONLY #77637
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Revert don't need to escape special characters anymore #78320
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Update assembly version from hardcoded to MajorVersion #78354
    area-Infrastructure
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • [wasi][draft] build WASI #77823
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • [Release/6.0][PERF] Fix perf repo branch setup target, tool build, and mono-dotnet create #78411
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Improve Span.Reverse fast path performance #70944
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Implement unmanaged-to-managed direction for vtable stub generator #77130
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • [wasm] Add new `runtime-wasm-features` pipeline #76822
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Allow interop resolvers to return self handle #78004
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono, community-contribution
  • Add support for dehydrated runtime data structures #77884
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [JIT] X64/ARM64 - Minor optimizations for small types on `ADD`, `SUB`, `MUL`, `AND`, `OR`, `XOR`, `NOT`, `NEG` #77874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reflection context tests working #77999
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Add `DllCharacteristics.ForceIntegrity` and `ControlFlowGuard`. #78072
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Put GenericTypeDefinition into genericCache to try to improve perf #78288
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Fix a typo. #78105
    area-Infrastructure
  • Update to the stable 7.0.100 SDK (WIP) #78034
    area-Infrastructure, 8.0.0
  • Removing outdated unused r2rdump tests #78431
    area-R2RDump-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Objective-C Marshal: object tracker support #78280
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix thread-safety issues with enumerating ResourceManager. #75054
    area-System.Resources, community-contribution
  • Remove mono specific SpanHelpers #78015
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Adding the Vector512 and Vector512<T> types #76642
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono][jit] Rework the implementation of __arglist to be platform ind… #78329
  • [release/7.0] source build backports #78395
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • Make JIT<->EE printing methods consistent and support nested classes when printing class names #76505
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add simple Else conditions to If Conversion #77728
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Replace successive "ldr" and "str" instructions with "ldp" and "stp" #77540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use helpers for implicit casts in importer #78279
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • fix DualMode ReceiveFrom on macOS #78261
    area-System.Net.Sockets, os-mac-os-x
  • Add ability for crossgen2 to synthesize PGO histograms #77683
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Remove hard_limit_for_bookkeeping #77480
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] [mono][wasm] Handle delegates decorated with [UnmanagedFunctionPointe… #78426
  • Use TaskDialog for error dialog in Windows GUI apps #78087
    area-Host
  • Don't emit frozen string literals for rare code paths #78370
    NO-MERGE, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Improve the handling of Create, CreateScalar, and CreateScalarUnsafe for vectors #78236
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Adding new ReadyToRun helper for static cctor #76898
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add XxHash128 #77944
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Manually backporting #74599 to 6.0 take 2 #78247
    NO-MERGE, area-Serialization, 6.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-16
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Bug] [NativeAOT-LLVM]: Unable to compile native WebAssembly library #2073

PullRequests

Created

  • Initialize locals in codegen #2091

Merged

  • Tweak details so that yielding after resuming works #2090
    area-green-threads
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Process blocks in SSA dominance to fix CSE mapping issue #2042
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Updated

  • Add deep stack test and reduce standard stack depth #2088

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet build fails on sln that contains a vcproj that references a CLR vcxproj #29088
  • Sdk tooling target framework should be net8.0 #29087
  • [release/7.0.2xx] System.NullReferenceException when running dotnet watch run #29085
  • [NETE2ESDK]With .NET 8 SDK installed, Warning "Workload garbage collection failed with error: An item with the same key has already been added. Key: (Microsoft.NETCore.App.Runtime.Mono.android-arm, 6.0.10) displayed when installing andriod workload in CLI. #29082
  • 1stBug #29081
  • [NETE2ESDK]With .NET8.0 SDK installed, the default tfm should not be "net7.0" when creating project in CLI. #29080

Closed

  • Workload commandline resolver #11495
    Backlog
  • Running `dotnet workload install` sometimes installs newer workload versions with no way back #19077
    7.0.1xx
  • artifacts\sdk-build-env.bat for bash and set dotnet_root #10949
    7.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • [ASP.NET] Remove versions from baselines #29093
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Fix unhandled exception during test discovery on macOS #29083

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #29020
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Simplify output testing #28994
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Retarget Microsoft.Extensions.DotNetDeltaApplier to netstandard2.1 #28984
    Servicing-approved, Area-Watch
  • [release/7.0.2xx] fixed dotnet/templating#5600 "No templates found" when required parameter is missing #29079

Updated

  • Add new option for json output of dotnet list package to release 7.2.xx branch #29017
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Don't Infer RID outside of dotnet publish for PublishSingleFile/PublishAot #29031
    area-runtime, Area-CLI, Area-SingleFile, Area-NativeAOT
  • Add PackageDependenciesDesignTime to cache assets file #28405
  • Deps.json should include project references that aren't present in project.assets.json #28963
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Update man pages post 7.0 GA #29032
  • Migrate the nuget state from earlier SDKs #29041
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Migrate the nuget state from earlier SDKs #29039
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Migrate the nuget state from earlier SDKs #29040
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use CodeAnalysis.Simplification to expand and reduce generated subtrees. Add tests to cover CSharpFileBuilder and CSharpSyntaxWriter classes. #29058
    Area-GenAPI
  • Make all public API in dotnet-watch.dll internal and sealed. #28260
    feature-dotnetwatch, Area-Watch
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2046490 #28957
    Area-Infrastructure

Issues

Updated

  • Proposal/Discussion: Negation of if/while Condition #568

  • Champion "Negated-condition if statement" #882

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Missing inputs in the key file #65474
    17.5
  • Receiver of a call taking InterpolatedStringHandler is unexpectedly copied in a way that mutations performed by the method are not observable #65470
  • Extract Method in file with top-level statements results in compile error #65465
  • Revise `ContainsDiagnostics` usages in parser #65464
  • Extract Method does not reproduce nullability of generic parameters of method parameters #65456
    Backlog
  • Question: Roslyn version in Visual Studio 17.4? #65455

Closed

  • Altering the preprocessor symbols with Project.WithParseOptions() does not re-evaluate conditionally included documents #65461
  • Test failed in CI: ExpanderAvailableWhenNotInTypeContextButNotAddingAnyItems #65362
    17.5
  • The `RefKind` of implicitly-typed lambda parameters should always be `RefKind.None` #64985
    17.5
  • C# compiler: severe performance issues with sister project #65142
    17.5
  • CA2252 - Static Abstract Build Error with Preview Features Enabled #65460
  • Servicing branches for releases #65174
  • ServiceHub.RoslynCodeAnalysisService.exe or devenv.exe could consume a CPU core permanently #65356
    17.5
  • VisualSudio 17.4 and Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.* 4.3.1 ignore WhiteSpace in VS-Settings or WorkSapce.CurrentSolution.Options respectively #65360
    17.4
  • No completion for parameter names inside `nameof` in attributes #65419
    17.5

PullRequests

Created

  • Use [Fact] not [WpfFact] #65473
    Area-IDE
  • Remove unused MismatchedParameterDefaultValue enum value #65472
    Area-Compilers
  • Create a new vsix for x64 .NET ServiceHub services #65471
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Run the conditional-token-placement fixer on roslyn #65469
    Area-IDE
  • Enable member edit analysis when LSP pull diagnostics is on #65468
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Add experimental formatting option to control places of `?` and `:` in a conditional expression. #65467
    Area-IDE
  • Warn for unused parameters in source #65466
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65459
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add lambda defaults/`params` tests from the test plan review #65458
    Area-Compilers
  • Check type parameter index bounds when parsing `DocumentationCommentId` #65457
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.5 #65453
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • View Call Hierarchy - fix thread block #65452
    Area-IDE
  • Warn for multiple blank lines in source #65451
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Add unit test entrypoint to just find a single result #65437
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix flaky test #65383
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Consult secondary index to avoid looking in a document for unit-test matches. #65436
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Implicitly-typed lambda parameters have RefKind.None #65350
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Add lambda defaults/`params` feature #65438
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Correct `Nullable<T>.Equals()` calls in `BoundNode.Update()` #65398
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Fix reading indent style and indent size from VS settings #65382
    Area-IDE, OnDeckForServicing
  • More tests for an issue around constrained calls #65385
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65454
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #65445
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65447
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Report analyzer telemetry for lightbulb code path in OOP #65212
    Area-Analyzers, Next
  • Fix reading indent style and indent size from VS settings #65420
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add a separate option to control solution crawler's support of generators #65268
    Area-IDE, Next
  • 17.4: Convert symbol-search crash to NFW #65280
    Area-IDE, OnDeckForServicing

Updated

  • Support new all-in-one-symbol-search APIs. #65449
    Area-IDE
  • Work some 'scoped' issues on IDE #65407
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Semantic Snippets - try catch snippet #65101
    Area-IDE
  • Move some severity configurations to globalconfig #65274
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Run suppressors insofar as there are suppressible errors #62641
    Area-Compilers, 17.5
  • Convert parser warning into a binding warning. #65440
    Area-Compilers
  • Expose constructor that allows for AnalysisOptions and a CancellationToken. #65051
    Area-Analyzers
  • Move IDS_FeatureXXX checks out of the parser #65413
    Area-Compilers
  • Improve `NormalizeWhitespace` for object initializers #65249
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Ensure the causing syntax node is always in the timing dictionary #65321
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.5
  • Attempt an alternative implementation of AsyncQueue #65080
    Area-Compilers
  • Parser semicolon in initializer expression error handling #65256
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Enhances the set of cases 'use pattern matching' works for. #65314
    Area-IDE
  • Allow usage of ref structs in VB despite CompilerFeatureRequired #65431
    Area-Compilers, 17.5
  • Pass in HostServices when creating the LSP server #65384
    Area-IDE
  • Refine error recovery in the parser around top level statements #65262
    Area-Compilers, 17.5
  • Semantic Snippets - else snippet #65178
    Area-IDE
  • Add additional cases whre 'use coalesce expression' can simplify code. #65371
    Area-IDE
  • Annotate implementations of IRangeVariableSymbol #39202
    Area-Compilers, Concept-Null Annotations
  • Fix wrong symbol comparisons #65430
    Area-Compilers, Community

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Blazor] ::deep does not work in combination with [dir="rtl"] #45138
  • ExceptionHandlerMiddleware should be able to include HTTP Headers from original requests #45137
  • Mechanism for delaying Blazor's first render until after some async operation #45131
    .NET 8 Planning
  • SpaProxy should not inject middleware with ASPNETCORE_HOSTINGSTARTUPASSEMBLIES #45130
  • Add support for url pattern /v1/books/ext-{external_id} in grpc transcoding #45126
  • [Feature Request] JS module adapter for Blazor #45120

Closed

  • TouchActions do not appear to work in Selenium #32373
    8.0-MQ
  • The remote certificate is invalid according to the validation procedure #15105
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Kestrel dev certificate woes #26536
    .NET 7 Planning
  • "SPA default page middleware could not return the default page '/index.html' when index.html is there and site is working as intended. #45135
  • .NET 7 Blazor WASM authentication back button history issue #45097 re-open request #45132
  • dotnet-watch flaky test Run_WithHotReloadEnabled_ReadsLaunchSettings #40740
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Running dotnet watch fails due to System.IO.FileNotFoundException #45129
  • Updated packages for 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.*' #45128
  • UserManager.ResetPasswordAsync causes entity to be tracked a second time #45048
  • Blazor WebAssembly lazy loading assemblies not working when using @ref attribute in the component #29342
    Backlog
  • Upgrading Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.NewtonsoftJson from 6 to 7 causes WebRequest to be empty #45124
  • BuildFromSource Windows Activate for VS #45119
  • IHttpContextAccessor.HttContext Session throws Exception when not enabled #45067
  • Web API broken in .NET 7.0 after trimming #44997

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix CookieHeaderParserShared throws exception when last cookie contains invalid character #45014 #45127
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • fix DefaultPolicy unreasonable behavior. #45122
    area-security, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Use new Arm64 Helix queues #45121
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode

Merged

  • Re-enable Blazor touch event test #45134
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview1
  • Use the Regex source generator in the AlphaRouteConstraint. #44770
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • [release/3.1] Use simpler Docker tags #45118
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.x

Updated

  • HttpSys request header dictionary does not remove headers when Remove() is called #44860
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2046770 #44686
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dbgshim fails to decode libcoreclr.so headers from Snap install #3510
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Updated

  • Add service manager and reflection based service discovery #3448

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Some lifecycle events under macOS are not working #11423
  • Unable to load font 'monospace' #11422
  • [Enhancement] Add support for ExpandoObject Binding to a ListView.ItemSource #11419
  • Radio button loses initial 'IsChecked=True' value when another radio button also has 'IsChecked=True' #11418
    Backlog
  • Maui.Graphics.Platform.PlatformGraphicsView Token Type Not Resolved #11413
  • Random crashes when using Drag&Drop with images #11411
    Backlog
  • [iOS]No Keyboard popup on Entry and Editor focus #11406
    Backlog
  • Remove calls to Console.WriteLine to decrease app size #11405
    Backlog
  • Line coordinates not computed correctly #11404
    Backlog
  • TabbedPage App on resize hides page bottom content #11402
    Backlog
  • NullReferenceException from ShellToolbar OnBackButtonCanExecuteChanged #11401
  • Low quality of the icon in the sample project #11400
    Backlog
  • .NET MAUI : Error CS0012- The type 'object' is defined in an assembly that is not referenced. You must add a reference to assembly 'Xamarin.iOS, Version=0.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=84e04ff9cfb79065'. #11399
  • Inputs on WPF Blazor Web View Control Not showing right click #11398

Closed

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • permission denied in database 'master' #29592
  • efcore 7 - json mapping to non-efcore updated column #29591
  • EFCore 7 - SqlServer - DataAnnotation 'TypeName' and fluent API 'HasColumnType' is not being honored for aggregate type for which ToJson() is defined #29587
  • EF Core 7 Problem when Add with entity with Identity and child entities with FK #29586
  • In EF7, SqLite unable to load spatialite using the NetTopologySuite Package #29584
  • EFCore (7.0) in MAUI (.NET 7) - first query in Release mode always throws error (Android) #29589
  • How to get metadata that configed on OnModelCreating #29583
  • Scaffolded DbContext produces CS8618 nullability warning since upgrade to EF Core 7 #29582
  • "Scaffolding:ConnectionString" annotation scaffolded #29580
  • Exception while applying migration with model containing descendant types with same property names #29579
  • ExecuteUpdate is not committing transactions even if included in an explicit transaction #29578
  • Bi-Temporal Table Support #29577

Closed

  • Query: Translate ElementAt(OrDefault) #17066
    8.0.0
  • How does efcore implement full join #29511
  • DbFunction definition returning nullable value type causes incorrect SQL to get generated #29585
    8.0.0
  • Possible mistake in translation from LINQ to SQL by EFC 6 #29581
  • Using IQueryable with record type - InvalidOperationException #29556

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix SQL Server result mapping for bulk insert (#29565) #29590
    Servicing-consider
  • [release/7.0] Use simpler Docker tags #29576
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode

Merged

  • Fix to #17066 - Query: Translate ElementAt(OrDefault) #29496
  • Fix SQL Server result mapping for bulk insert #29565
  • Detect DbFunction returning a nullable value expression #29588
  • [SMALL] Fix to #29572 - Json: predicate on json bool property generates incorrect sql #29574
    auto-merge

Updated

  • Make DbUpdateException.Entries contain all entries when we can't populate it #29571
  • Fix to #28881 - Consider removing unnecessary CASTs around JSON_VALUE #29417
  • Reverse engineering of Dynamics CRM TDS endpoint and Synapse Serverless SQL Pool #29122
  • [release/6.0] Use simpler Docker tags #29575
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NETE2ESDK] With .NET 8.0 SDK pkg installed on MAC, showing a redundant .NET Runtime #15003
  • [NETE2ESDK] With .NET 8.0 SDK zip/tar.gz installed, showing a redundant .NET Runtime #15001
  • [NETE2ESDK] Info for .NET 8.0 are not updated on .NET 8 SDK installation wizard #14996

Closed

  • cli command missing for installing different versions of dotnet #14977
  • Crossgen targets hardcode TFMs #14965

PullRequests

Created

Updated
